name: FemDomination 2
description:
This game follows the adventure of a protagonist caught up in a sexy BDSM web of lies and deceit.
You will attempt to escape the clutches of the hot dominatrices and make your way to freedom while enduring their hospitality.
Experience the visceral action in a VR / non-VR setting from either the first-person view or a float free cam to get all the angles you want.
Game features:
- point-of-view and free cam for each scene
- areas with interactive elements
- multiple endings
- fully voiced over NPCs
- narrator voice for PC character's thoughts
- character customization
- 8 hours of gameplay
